Name: [RECOMMENDED] Rebalanced Cooking
Description: It's impossible for the player to eat raw materials, and cooked food (e.g. Boiled Egg, Frozen and Roasted food) is no longer able to stack. Non Zonai scalable enemy parts were buffed, or heavily buffed compared to vanilla, so that they still offer some value even compared to the new, very powerful golden enemy parts. The amount of meal slots was divided by 2 (60 -> 30).
